alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued October 15 at 9:38PM CDT until October 16 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 33 to 35 degrees will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Nance, Merrick, Polk, Hamilton, York, Clay, Fillmore, Nuckolls and Thayer Counties in Nebraska. Jewell and Mitchell Counties in Kansas. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 9 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Clearing skies overnight and light winds should allow for near freezing temperatures and widespread frost formation by dawn Monday morning.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
